tuv.seg: Making a complaint about telecommunications or postal services
Ag déanamh gearáin faoi sheirbhísí teileachumarsáide nó seirbhísí poist
The Commission for Communications Regulation (ComReg) is the statutory body charged with regulation of the electronic communications and postal sector, including premium rate telephone services

Is iad an Coimisiún um Rialáil Cumarsáide (ComReg) an comhlacht reachtúil atá freagrach as rialáil a dhéanamh ar chumarsáid leictreonach agus an earnáil phoist, lena n-áirítear seirbhísí gutháin ardráta
It also deals with unresolved complaints about telecommunications and postal services
Déileálann siad freisin le gearáin neamh-réitithe faoi sheirbhísí teileachumarsáide agus seirbhísí poist
ComReg has produced a guide to your rights when making a complaint about your service provider
Tá treoir do na chearta atá agat maidir le gearán a dhéanamh faoi sholáthraí de sheirbhísí curtha amach ag ComReg
Where should I complain?
Cén áit ar cheart dom an gearán a dhéanamh?
If you have an issue with your service provider, you should first contact your provider, outline your complaint and ask for it to be resolved
Más fadhb atá agat le soláthraí do sheirbhíse ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leo siúd ar dtúis, déan cur síos gairid ar ábhar do ghearáin agus iarr orthu réiteach a sholáthar
It is important to act quickly and be aware of any time limits that may apply to making a complaint
Is tábhachtach gníomhú go tapa agus a bheith feasach ar aon teorainneacha ama a d’fhéadfadh baint le gearán a dhéanamh
Your provider should have a code of practice for handling complaints
Ba chóir go mbeadh cód cleachtais ag an soláthraí chun gearáin a láimhseáil
Try to be clear about the issue by providing enough details when making the complaint to your service provider
Bí chomh soiléir agus is féidir leat faoi gceist agus tabhair oiread sonraí agus is gá le linn duit a bheith ag déanamh an ghearáin
Record the date and time that you make your complaint and ask for a reference number for your complaint
Cur síos an t-am agus an dáta a rinne tú an gearán agus iarr uimhir thagartha don ghearán
Make a note of the name of the person who takes your complaint
Cur síos ainm an duine a ghlac an gearán uait
Give your service provider a chance to resolve your complaint
Tabhair caoi agus am don soláthraí chun an cheist a réiteach
Make a note of any commitments that are made by your provider
Déan nóta d’aon ghealltanais a thugann an soláthraí duit
ComReg provides further information to assist you when making a complaint to your telecommunications or postal service provider on its consumer website www.askcomreg.ie

Soláthraíonn ComReg breis faisnéise chun cabhrú leat nuair a bhíonn gearán á dhéanamh agat le do sholáthraí seirbhísí teileachumarsáide nó poist ar a láithreán gréasáin do thomhaltóirí, www.askcomreg.ie
Advice for consumers on making a complaint about premium rate telephone services is also available on ComReg’s website
Tá fáil ar chomhairle ar ghearán a dhéanamh faoi sheirbhísí gutháin ardráta chomh maith ar láithreán gréasáin ComReg
Who can complain to ComReg?
Cé tá i dteideal gearán a dhéanamh le ComReg?
If you have used your service provider's complaint procedure and you are not satisfied with the outcome, you can complain to ComReg
Má d’úsáid tú nós imeachta gearáin do sholáthraí agus mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an toradh, féadfaidh tú gearán a dhéanamh le ComReg
ComReg cannot act on a consumer complaint until the service provider’s complaint handling process is completed
Ní féidir le ComReg gníomhú ar ghearán tomhaltóra go dtí go gcríochnaítear próiseas láimhseála gearáin sholáthar na seirbhíse
The issue giving rise to your complaint must have occurred within the previous 9 months for telecommunications issues
Ní mór d’aon ghearán le ComReg a bhaineann le cúrsaí teileachumarsáide a bheith déanta laistigh de 9 mí ón uair a tharla an eachtra is ábhar don ghearán
However, you must make your complaint within 3 months of the use of a premium rate service
Ní mór gearáin a dhéanamh taobh istigh de 3 mhí ón am a úsáideann tú seirbhís gutháin ag ardráta
There is no charge for making a complaint to ComReg
Níl táille ar bith ar ghearán a dhéanamh le ComReg
If you have an issue with your service provider, you should first contact your provider, outline your complaint and ask for it to be resolved
Má tá saincheist agat maidir le do sholáthraí seirbhíse, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le do sholáthraí ar dtús, cuntas a thabhairt ar do ghearán agus iarraidh go réitítear é
If you wish to make a complaint to ComReg, you can make it by phone, fax, e-mail or by post
Más maith leat gearán a dhéanamh le ComReg, tig leat é a dhéanamh ar teileafón, ar facs, ar ríomhphost nó tríd an ghnáthphost
You can also complete an online complaint form
Tig leat freisin foirm ghearáin ar líne a chur isteach
What details should I give about my complaint?
Cad iad na sonraí ba cheart dom a thabhairt sa ghearán?
When you contact ComReg you should provide the following:
Nuair a theagmhaíonn tú le ComReg ba cheart duit an t-eolas seo a thabhairt:
• Your contact details including a mobile telephone number if possible for telecoms complaints, and full postal address for postal complaints
• Sonraí teagmhála, cur i gcás uimhir fóin phóca, más féidir, i gcomhair gearán teileachumarsáide, agus seoladh iomlán poist i gcomhair gearán poist
• The account name and account number (if applicable)
• Ainm agus uimhir an chuntais (más ábhartha)
• Details of the complaint, including the complaint reference number
• Sonraí an ghearáin, uimhir thagartha san áireamh
• Details about previous dealings with the service provider
• Sonraí faoi dhéileálacha leis an soláthraí céanna roimhe sin
• A clear statement of what you hope to achieve by raising your complaint
• Ráiteas soiléir faoin dtoradh a bheadh súil agat leis as an ngearán a dhéanamh
When you are giving your information, you should let Comreg know if there are any particular details that you do not want ComReg to send to the service provider
Le linn duit a bheith ag tabhairt an eolais, má tá sonraí ar bith nach mian leat a thabhairt don soláthraí seirbhíse, ba cheart duit é sin a rá le ComReg
If you have an issue with your service provider, you should first contact your provider, outline your complaint and ask for it to be resolved
Má tá saincheist agat maidir le do sholáthraí seirbhíse, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le do sholáthraí ar dtús, cuntas a thabhairt ar do ghearán agus iarraidh go réitítear é
If you have used your service provider’s complaint procedure and you are not satisfied with the outcome, you can complain to ComReg
Má tá an nós imeachta gearáin do sholáthraí seirbhíse úsáidte agat agus mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an toradh nó an freagra, ansin is féidir leat gearán a dhéanamh le ComReg
